body.p: The Gnome desktop is being updated to 2.12 for the more daring Gentooists, reports this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter, which also carries a detailed report and pictures from the London edition of the Linux World Expo. The next monthly Gentoo User Meeting (GUM) in Germany promises to be unusually exciting with a system intrusion contest, and the Gentoo in the press section found a video clip from a TV broadcast of a school's computer lab running Gentoo. This and more, including of course the weekly statistics from the Gentoo bug report system, and several GLSAs are on the menu this week. Have fun!
